alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jones and eastern Fisher Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sylvester, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamlin, Sylvester, Neinda, Longworth, Mccaulley, The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126, Hitson and Tuxedo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Texas.
